comment: Skipping 10 because that's the CustomModelData for unset pures and using it could make things a tad confusing
Beast is the same as unset, except for the scream activation and nocturnal titans
Attack has a higher average attack damage, Female/Jaw/Cart a higher average speed, Armored/Warhammer higher average defense, Colossal higher size, and Founding also makes nocturnal titans

self_action.command: title @s actionbar "This weapon is too small for you"

modifier.name: No exhaustion in pure titan form

actions.command: title @s actionbar "You're too big to ride that"
